subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Atlanta Braves pitcher Tim Hudson had a lot on his mind last night. He took the mound with the initials “JH” on the front of his jersey. Before every inning, he scribbled the letters “VM” in the dirt with his cleats.
snippet: Atlanta Braves pitcher Tim Hudson had a lot on his mind last night. He took the mound with the initials “JH” on the front of his jersey. Before every inning, he scribbled the letters “VM” in the dirt with his cleats.
